document.full_text: actor jackie cooper, the former child star who enjoyed renewed fame years later as daily planet editor perry white in the christopher reeve "superman" movies, has died near los angeles, his attorney said on wednesday. he was 88.
document.title: hollywood actor jackie cooper dead at 88
lines_and_colors: actor jackie cooper, the former child star who enjoyed renewed fame years later as daily planet editor perry white in the christopher reeve "superman" movies, has died near los angeles, his attorney said on wednesday. he was 88.
